title: FAIL: TestFileWmf.test_load_raw on Windows
body:

  File "D:\Build\Pillow\Pillow-git\Tests\helper.py", line 110, in assert_image_similar
    ave_diff, epsilon))
AssertionError:  average pixel value difference 1.8203 > epsilon 0.5000
